title: Got a chat restriction
body: Im really happy to see that riot is punishing players for abuse. Im definitely not going to do it again. Even thou i wasnt really serious. more just having a laugh. i understand how it can be taken the wrong way very very easily. thanks riot! good to see the system is improving and we are heading towards a cleaner community.

replies.body:
Great attitude to have! 

Good on you for recognising the behaviour and committing to working on it :)

I got a chat restriction, for no reason whatsover and I do know why.

Last game I had a Vayne who was clearly the worst player on the map constantly complaining about me apparently feeding. And by worst I mean to the point she had the worst stats and was tumbling INTO the enemy, than proceeding to Impale them INTO our team, you know, just for the extra help to kill our team faster.

I died once to Garen and once to Jayce mid early game and for the next 30 minutes or so she would never stop complaining about me, no doubt she reported me.

While the system does work in some ways, it is also flawed in that players can report for no reason or just because they don't like you and you have to suffer.

I recently got a chat restriction aswell because of a few comments that were clearly taken wrong by the other players, I learnt my lesson and will be sure not to make sarcastic remarks in future games.
